item.description:
NEW STUFF:
This movie starts at 8:00, so let's meet by 7:30 and head in to buy our goodies. We meet out front of the theater, but if it's too cold, we'll meet just inside the doors.

RSVP if you can come!

OLD STUFF:
Miracle at St. Anna seems to be one of those movies that just look and feel different on the big screen. So how about we get involved in the story together? Here's the synopsis:

Four soldiers from the army's Negro 92nd Division find themselves separated from their unit and behind enemy lines. Risking their lives for a country in which they are treated with less respect than the enemy they are fighting, they discover humanity in the small Tuscan village of St. Anna di Stazzema.

Bring guests, just be sure to include them in the RSVP. Discounted tickets are $8.50 for FMM members and their guests. Small popcorn and small drink tickets are $3 each.

Cell: 508-308-4897 in case you get late, get lost, or need direx.

We'll head to TGI Fridays after to chat/snack/whatever.

Hope to see you there!

--Dana
item.name: Miracle at St. Anna
